db:abstract.db:para: Particle using a Qt Quick 3D Model.
This type was introduced in Qt 6.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The ModelParticle3D is a logical particle element that creates particles from a Qt Quick 3D Model component.

db:section.db:title: delegate : Component

db:section.db:title: instanceTable : Instancing
db:section.db:para: The instanceTable provides access to the Instancing table of the model particle. ModelParticle3D uses an internal instance table to implement efficient rendering. This table can be applied to the instancing property of models that are not part of the particle system.
